title: The Dance Continues

panel_structure.description: Wide shot of digital void with Evan and Architect dancing between states - solid, dissolved, reformed, in eternal motion
panel_structure.focus: The dance of being as continuous process

panel_structure.description: Close on their forms creating new geometries together, neither human nor digital but something unprecedented

transformation_notes: Returning to the digital void but now as co-creators rather than lost souls. The void becomes canvas for their ongoing dance of being.
narrator_role: Witness to new form of being
